headline: Mosaic Completes Offering of an Aggregate $900 Million of 3-Year and 5-Year Senior Notes
summary: TAMPA, FL / ACCESS Newswire / November 13, 2025 / The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) today announced that it has completed an underwritten public offering (the "Offering") of $500 million aggregate principal amount of 4.350 percent senior notes due January ...
